name: Keep it Lit!
description:
Manage your party and keep it lit!

This game was made for Ludum Dare 46 with the "Keep it Alive" theme.

In this game you throw a great party and need to make sure everyone is having a great time, but... Is the music too loud? Does everyone have drinks and snacks? Is the toilet failing? Oh no! IS THAT PUKE?!

There is a lot to do, can you handle it?

Controls:
  • Move: WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Interact: E or Space
Help:
  • Be sure to always have a CD playing, you can have two CDs in the stereo, go fetch a CD from the CD rack and leave it at the stereo to keep the music playing.
  • If the volume is too loud or too soft, Go to the stereo, and interact to change it!
  • Puke is disgusting, grab the mop and clean it up, be sure to leave the mop back into a bucket.
  • No snacks? Be sure to keep your bowls full! Grab one, go to the popcorn machine to fill it up, then leave it back at the table.
  • No drinks? Grab a bottle from the mini-fridge then leave it at the table.
  • If the toilet is out of order, you can grab the mop and go clean it, then leave the mop back in a bucket.
  • Oh the lights go out now and then, you can go to the switch and turn them back on.
